metadata.title: CVE-2021-40049 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a permission control vulnerability in the PMS module. Successfulexploitation of this vulnerability can lead to sensitive system informationbeing obtained without authorization.

criterions.comment: pms: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
